attributes.action: Stop Nissan Micra and pre 2008 Skoda owners from driving between 8.00-10am and 4.30-6pm and at Weekends.
attributes.additional_details: Ban drivers of Nissan Micra's and Skoda's from being allowed to drive between 8.00-10am and 4.30-6pm and at weekends. These drivers cause massive amounts of congestion and are becoming a hazard to drivers driving at the legal speed limit.
